      • testReadFirstASN1ObjectLargerThanMaxRequestSize

        public void testReadFirstASN1ObjectLargerThanMaxRequestSize()
        Tries to process a stream with size larger than specified limit. Sending a stream of infinite length may be part of a DOS attack.

      • testReadFirstASN1ObjectWithBrokenStream

        public void testReadFirstASN1ObjectWithBrokenStream()
                                             throws IOException
        Test readFirstASN1Object() with a stream that is missing it's last byte. Might be due to a broken connection.
        Throws:
        IOException - Fail
